Russian Hybrids

It is dark times, a top secret experiment in the Soviet Union that will stop the Americans in the Cold War,but these experiments pack a deadly punch, the animals need a cure so they can turn back to normal, while the Russians and the Americans have an epic showdown. Later on there is, an adventure with a dog in space and mythical beasts such as; Cerberus, Pegasus and even a Kraken. This story is full of adventure and action, with a few twist.
